title: The Trendshine Of My Zeit 4/5: Bad Bunny, Kourtney Kardashian, Elon Musk, Student Loans, Obama, Tiger Woods
itunes:title: The Trendshine Of My Zeit 4/5: Bad Bunny, Kourtney Kardashian, Elon Musk, Student Loans, Obama, Tiger Woods
description:
In this edition of The Trendshine Of My Zeit, Miles and super producer Becca discuss the Bad Bunny tour, Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker getting married, Elon Musk finally getting a seat at the table (in the Twitter boardroom), the student loan freeze, Obama returning to the White House, and Tiger Woods eyeing the Masters!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
